Aquatic.name: 水栖
Aquatic.description: • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (水栖)]{水栖}: @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.移动]{移速} 5.

Burrow.name: 遁地
Burrow.description: • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (遁地)]{遁地} (20″): Giant worms tunnel through the ground, blocked only by solid bedrock.

Change Form.name: 变幻形态
Change Form.description: • Change Form: As an action, a vampire can change into a wolf or bat with a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特性]{聪慧} roll at −2. Changing back into humanoid form requires a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特性]{聪慧} roll.

Charm.name: 魅惑
Charm.description: • Charm: Vampires can use the @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-powers.傀儡]{傀儡} power on those attracted to them (GM’s call) using their @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特性]{聪慧} as their @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.Arcane Backgrounds]{奥法技能}. They can cast and maintain the power indefinitely, but may only affect one target at a time.

Children of the Night.name: 夜之子民
Children of the Night.description: • Children of the Night: Ancient vampires have the ability to summon and control wolves or rats. This requires an action and a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特性]{聪慧} roll at −2. If successful, [[1d6]] # Wolves summoned wolves or [[1d6]] # Swarms of rats summoned swarms of rats (see @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-bestiary.集群]{集群}) come from the surrounding wilds in [[1d6+2]] # Rounds until summoned rounds.

Constrict.name: 紧勒
Constrict.description: • Constrict: +2 to @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特性]{运动} and @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特性]{力量} rolls made to @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.擒抱]{擒抱}.

Construct.name: 构装体
Construct.description: • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (构装体)]{构装体}: +2 to recover from being @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.伤害效果]{动摇}; ignores 1 point of Wound penalties; does not breathe or suffer from @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.疾病]{疾病} or @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.毒素]{毒素}.

Elemental.name: 元素
Elemental.description: • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (元素)]{Elemental}: No additional damage from @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.定点攻击]{定点攻击}, ignores 1 point of Wound penalties, doesn’t breathe, immune to @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.疾病]{疾病} and @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.毒素]{毒素}.

Ethereal.name: 灵态
Ethereal.description: • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (灵态)]{灵态}: Ghosts can become invisible and immaterial at will and can only be harmed by magical attacks.

Fast Regeneration.name: 快速再生
Fast Regeneration.description: • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (再生)]{快速再生}: Some creatures heal quickly and may attempt a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.医疗]{自然恢复} roll every round, even if @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.伤害效果]{无力化}, unless their @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.伤害效果]{损伤} were caused by ﬁre or ﬂame or they’re put to the torch afterward.

Fear.name: 恐惧
Fear.description: • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (恐惧)]{恐惧}: Anyone who sees this terror must make a Fear check.

Fear (-2).name: 恐惧 (-2)
Fear (-2).description: • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (恐惧)]{恐惧} (−2): Anyone who sees this horror must make a Fear check at −2.

Fearless.name: 无畏
Fearless.description: • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (无畏)]{无畏}: Immune to @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.恐惧]{恐惧} and @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-skills.威吓]{威吓}, but may be smart enough to react to fear-causing situations aptly.

Flight.name: 飞行
Flight.description: • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (飞行)]{飞行}: Flying Pace of 24″.

Gaseous Form.name: 气态
Gaseous Form.description: • Gaseous Form: Can maneuver through any non-solid surface, pass through cracks in doors or windows, bubble through water, etc.

Hardy.name: 顽强
Hardy.description: • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (顽强)]{顽强}: The creature does not suffer a Wound from being @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.伤害效果]{动摇} twice.

Immunity.name: 免疫
Immunity.description: • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (免疫)]{免疫}: Immune to water-based attacks.

Infection.name: 感染
Infection.description: • Infection: Anyone slain by a were­wolf has a 50% chance of rising as a werewolf themselves. The character involuntarily transforms every full moon. He gains control of his lycanthropy only after [[/sr 1d6 # Years after which the character gains control of lycanthropy]] years as a werewolf.

Infravision.name: 红外感应
Infravision.description: • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (红外感应)]{红外感应} Halve penalties for Illumination when attacking warm targets.

Invulnerability.name: 无敌
Invulnerability.description: • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (无敌)]{无敌}: Immune to non-magical attacks.

Low Light Vision.name: 微光视觉
Low Light Vision.description: • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (微光视觉)]{微光视觉}: Ignore penalties for Dim and Dark @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.照明]{照明}.

Mist.name: 化雾
Mist.description: • Mist: Ancient vampires have the ability to turn into mist. Doing so (or returning to human form) requires an action and a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特性]{聪慧} roll at −2.

Night Vision.name: 夜视
Night Vision.description: • Night Vision: Sensor packages ignore penalties for @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.照明]{照明}.

Ornery.name: 犟脾气
Ornery.description: • Ornery: Mules are contrary creatures. Characters must subtract 1 from their @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-skills.骑乘]{骑乘} rolls when riding them.

Poison.name: 毒素
Poison.description: • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (毒素)]{毒素}: The GM chooses what kind of @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.毒素]{毒素} the viper injects.

Poison (-4).name: 毒素 (-4)
Poison (-4).description: • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (毒素)]{毒素} (−4): Usually @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.毒素]{温和} or @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.毒素]{致命}.

Resilient.name: 强韧
Resilient.description: • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (强韧/非常强韧)]{强韧}: Some creatures can take one Wound before they’re Incapacitated.

Seep.name: 渗透
Seep.description: • Seep: Can squeeze through any porous gap as if it were @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.移动]{困难地形}.

Sire.name: 眷属
Sire.description: • Sire: Anyone slain by a vampire has a 50% chance of rising as a vampire in [[/r 1d4]] days.

Split.name: 分裂
Split.description: • Split: Some swarms split into two smaller swarms when @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.伤害效果]{损伤} (GM’s call). Reduce the @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.范围效果攻击]{爆散盖板} one size after a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.伤害效果]{损伤}; Small swarms are destroyed.

Swarm.name: 集群
Swarm.description: • Swarm: +2 to recover from being @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.伤害效果]{动摇}, @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.角色]{格挡} +2. Swarms are composed of many small creatures, so cutting and piercing weapons do no real damage. @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.范围效果攻击]{Area eﬀect attacks} work normally, and a character can stomp to inﬂict his damage in @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特性]{力量} each round. Some swarms (bees, hornets, birds) may be foiled by total immersion in water.

Swat.name: 猛击
Swat.description: • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (猛击)]{猛击}: Dragons ignore up to 4 points of @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.Size and Scale]{尺寸} penalties when attacking with their claws.

Undead.name: 不死族
Undead.description: • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (不死族)]{不死族}: +2 Toughness; +2 to recover from being @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.伤害效果]{动摇}; no additional damage from @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.定点攻击]{定点攻击}; ignores 1 point of Wound penalties; doesn’t breathe; immune to @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.疾病]{疾病} and @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.毒素]{毒素}.

Wall Walker.name: 走壁
Wall Walker.description: • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (走壁)]{走壁}:The creatures move at their full @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.移动]{移速} on walls and ceilings! Creepy!

Weakness.name: 弱点
Weakness.description: • Weakness (Invitation Only): Vampires cannot enter a private dwelling without being invited. They may enter public domains as they please.

Zombie.name: 行尸
Zombie.description: • Zombie: Liches are necromancers first and foremost. The undead they raise through the @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-powers.行尸]{行尸} spell are permanent, and they may raise @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-bestiary.骷髅]{骷髅} just like @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-bestiary.行尸]{zombies} as they choose. Some liches have built up entire armies of the undead at their disposal.
